jobDescription: We are looking for a Data Engineer that will work on collecting, storing, processing, and analyzing large sets of data. The ideal candidate would have a passion for data and knowledge of Python, Linux, SQL and Data Modeling. This is an opportunity to build something out from the ground up! PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES 1) Develop processes for extracting and transforming large data sets for querying and reporting  2) Build dashboards and reports for our leadership and product teams  3) Collaborate with team and business owners to define requirements  4) Research and propose innovative solutions to complex problems QUALIFICATIONS 1) Minimum 2-3 years experience developing data processing applications  2) Passion for learning and experimenting with machine learning  3) Experience with Amazon Web Services  4) Proficient understanding of relational database management systems and SQL  5) Programming skills in Python or Java  6) Experience on a UNIX or Linux platform applications
